product_name: Moving Comfort Endurance Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Great for training or race day, the women's Moving Comfort Endurance Shorts feature inner briefs with 2 pockets for energy gels and a rear zip stash pocket sized perfectly for your ID. Lightweight shorts wick moisture and are made from recycled polyester with spandex for stretch. Inner wicking briefs provide modesty and comfort. Wide waistband has internal heathered fabric and stretch drawcord. Sheer elastic ribbon adds a touch of glimmer at the leg hems of the Moving Comfort Endurance Shorts. Closeout.
short_description: Great for training or race day, the women's Moving Comfort Endurance Shorts feature inner briefs with 2 pockets for energy gels and a rear zip stash pocket sized perfectly for your ID.
